channel.title: letsencrypt on IT技术分享
channel.description: Recent content in letsencrypt on IT技术分享

item.title: 免费ssl证书 letsencrypt
item.description: git clone https://github.com/letsencrypt/letsencrypt cd letsencrypt ./letsencrypt-auto –agree-tos –email flyhawk007online@gmail.com certonly –webroot -w /home/www/wwwroot/51hint -d 51hint.com /etc/letsencrypt/live/51hint.com <VirtualHost *:443> SSLEngine on SSLCertificateFile /etc/letsencrypt/live/51hint.com/cert.pem SSLCertificateKeyFile /etc/letsencrypt/live/51hint.com/privkey.pem SSLCertificateChainFile /etc/letsencrypt/live/51hint.com/chain.pem <Directory home/www/wwwroot/51hint/> AllowOverride All Order allow,deny Allow from all DocumentRoot home/www/wwwroot/51hint/ ServerName 51hint.com ErrorLog logs/51hint-error_log CustomLog logs/51hint-access_log common sudo crontab -e 0 3
